casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Philip Mann (12672)

O’Connell, Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued June 6 decision released June 28, 1994 Philip Mann, pro se, the appellant (defendant). *934David J. Sheldon, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Patricia A. Swords, state’s attorney, and Richard Preston, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
